channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Hair by Philip Kingsley
channel.desc: Internationally renowned Philip Kingsley and his team give expert tips and tricks on how to get the best results for your hair and scalp.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Nails Inc
channel.desc: A show of hot seasonal colours, classic manicure favourites and unique nail care solutions from Nails Inc.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty's Best Finds
channel.desc: Up your beauty game with our best finds in the industry, from favourite formulas to the latest releases. Whether you want to shake up your make-up or step up your skincare, find it here.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Look Good, Feel Good
channel.desc: Find the best in health and fitness products to give you a spring in your step and a healthier lifestyle. From top tips and great gadgets, we'll help you to revitalise your daily routine.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elemis Skin Therapies
channel.desc: Care for your mind and body holistically and sensuously with therapeutic aromatherapy. Elemis are famed for their premier spa and salon treatments, and for the absolute purity of their plant oils.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: June Beauty Deals
channel.desc: June Beauty Deals.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: skinSense by Abi Cleeve
channel.desc: Bringing together the latest, ground-breaking technology with the highest grade concentration of unique active ingredients, discover long-lasting skincare with anti-ageing benefits from skinSense.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: SVR Laboratoires Skincare
channel.desc: Treat your skin to SVR Laboratories formulas, a French pharmacy founded in 1962 offering powerful skincare solutions that are gentle enough for even sensitive skin.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves...
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Prai Beauty
channel.desc: Prai is a ginger-like root that has been harvested in the tropical forests of Thailand for more than 1000 years. This range of prestige skincare combines traditional wisdom with the latest technology.
